       Crystallised old dictionary, not ‘bible found at bottom of ocean’

   Published on 11 June 2019
   A photo of a book covered in white crystals has been posted on Facebook
   with a claim that it shows a miracle.

The caption reads: “An ancient bible has been found at the bottom of the
   ocean and is still Readable!

“I became aware that someone stole the crystallised book image from my
   blog a while ago and was falsely claiming it was an ancient bible fished
   out of the sea.
“The process of crystallising the book is quite easy.
